title: Reggie Fils-Aimé believes the best video game innovations are carried by one simple thing — a good game (rerun)
itunes:title: Reggie Fils-Aimé believes the best video game innovations are carried by one simple thing — a good game (rerun)
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: This episode originally aired on May 3, 2022. Video games are more technologically sophisticated than ever these days — virtual reality headsets, augmented reality integration and some of the most powerful and realistic graphics yet. At the end of the day, a good, innovative video game needs one important element. According to industry veteran Reggie Fils-Aimé, former president of Nintendo of America, it’s simply to make the game good and fun. Fils-Aimé retired in 2019 but reflects on these ideas and his history of disrupting the gaming sector in his new autobiography, “Disrupting the Game: From the Bronx to the Top of Nintendo.”
